description: This is the Description of Work for the RFP requirement. Replace this text with yours and format differently as highlighted.",-
full_summary:
===============

**Title**: 
------------

One (1) P2 Enterprise Architect - Level 3

**Reference Number** : cb-985-87616394
**Solicitation Number**: 202301687

**Publication Date**: 2023-11-30
**Closing Date**: 2023-12-15, 14:00 EST

**Contract Start Date**: Anticipated 2024-04-01
**Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements**: This procurement is open to suppliers who are eligible under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)

**Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Description**: 
---------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of one (1) P2 Enterprise Architect - Level 3 for a total of 240 days per year. The contract period will be two years with an irrevocable option to extend it for three additional one-year periods. 

**Requirement Details**:
-----------------------

* Service Category: Enterprise Architect
* Service Level: P2
* Service Period: 240 days per year
* Contract Period: Two years with option to extend
* Security Clearance: RCMP ERS Reliability Clearance is a requirement

**Contact Information**: 
-----------------------

* Name: Steve Lafontaine
* Email: steve.lafontaine@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 571-1180

**Note**:
---------

* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Bidders are advised to regularly check the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for updates on the procurement.
* Indigenous businesses are encouraged to register in the Federal Indigenous Business Directory to increase their visibility and compete for federal government contracts.

Please submit your proposal electronically through the GETS system and contact the Contracting Authority for any inquiries.  [Contact Information](#contact-info)
